narrators.name: Abd al-Rahman

narrators.name: Ibrahim

chainIssues: Mawquf hadith - does not reach the Prophet ﷺ

potential_issues.issue: First narrator Abd al-Rahman is completely unknown (majhul)
Second narrator Ibrahim is unknown
Ibn Abi Nujayh is a known mudallis using عَنِ
potential_issues.impact: Requires verification of direct connection to Mujahid
